title: Deciphering polymer degradation chemistry via integrating new database construction into suspect screening analysis
content:
Environ. Sci.: Processes Impacts, 2024, 26,1184-1197
DOI: 10.1039/D4EM00212A, Paper
Phoebe Keyes, Noor Halimah, Boya Xiong
For the first time, a novel suspect screening workflow enabled chemical structure identification of complex mixtures from free radical-induced oxidative chain scission of polyacrylamide used in hydraulic fracturing.
